channel.title: Need a compiler?

item.title: Need a compiler?
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Hey guys, i use this compiler, and run server just remove your current compiler with this one if yours doesn’t work;

@echo off title d-d-s-p-3-c compile/run "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_07/bin/javac.exe" *.java "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_07/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m server pause

Still not working?
Try this one;

@echo off color 0a title TweezyScape if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit (just a compiler)

If your run server doesn’t work have this one ^^

@echo off color 0a title TweezyScape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic
